entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 12:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
